translations: 妨碍（interfere 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: I wish everyone would stop interfering and just leave me alone.
sentences.translation: 我希望所有人都不再干涉我，让我一个人静一静。

sentences.sentence: I wish my mother would stop interfering and let me make my own decisions.
sentences.translation: 我希望我母亲不再干预，让我自己拿主意。
